Question
========

To test whether two population variances are equal we use an F-test; the test quantity takes the value 4.65, and follows if H~0~ TRUE is an F-distribution with 7 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 5 in the denominator. For the corresponding two-sided P-value, then

Answerlist
----------

* P < 0.01
* 0.01 < P < 0.05
* 0.05 < P < 0.10
* P > 0.10

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* P < 0.01: Incorrect
* 0.01 < P < 0.05: Incorrect
* 0.05 < P < 0.10: Incorrect
* P > 0.10: Correct
